Comments: It’s a fully formed hybrid and multi-cloud approach. It has come a long way in the last 18 months to solve challenges for multi-cloud.  The cross-cloud capability is almost the headline for visibility and control.  Good for innovation
Proposed.Summary: It’s a fully formed hybrid and multi-cloud approach. It has come a long way in the last 18 months to solve challenges for multi-cloud.  The cross-cloud capability is almost the headline for visibility and control.  Good for innovation

Comments: Network Insight makes the transition to NSX much easier.  This fills a huge void and is the glue to tie teams together (networking, security and operations). I see how it can even be used in the container world.  It’s very powerful and can do some interesting things
Proposed.Summary: Network Insight makes the transition to NSX much easier.  This fills a huge void and is the glue to tie teams together (networking, security and operations). I see how it can even be used in the container world.  It’s very powerful and can do some interesting things

Comments: Gartner continues to receive complaints about support for VMware AirWatch from clients who do not have a direct Technical Account Manager (TAM). Clients who have purchased the TAM option do not report issues with service. VMware has also added direct enterprise support known as "pods" to address support quality for larger installations.
Proposed.Summary: Complaints about AirWatch support from clients without a direct Technical Account Manager (TAM). Clients who have purchased the TAM option do not report issues with service. VMware has also added direct enterprise support known as "pods" to address support quality for larger installations.

Comments: VMware value proposition needs to be stronger in our message.  Use cases are an effective marketing tool for us.  Use personas and use cases to tell our story.
Proposed.Summary: VMware value prop needs to be stronger. Use personas and use cases to tell our story.

Comments: Cloud Servicesis confusing.  They are individual silo'd services that don't seem to fit together.
Proposed.Summary: Cloud Servicesis confusing. They are individual silo'd services that don't seem to fit together.

Comments: Need a strong value statement.  Customers are questioning if VMware wants to lead or just sell more product
Proposed.Summary: Need a strong value statement. Customers are questioning if VMware wants to lead or just sell more product

Comments: Need use cases
Proposed.Summary: Need use cases

Comments: "Devil is in the details, but I like what I'm hearing from VMware." "Freedom with boundaries." "Need to get customers past the fact that many Cloud (VCPP) initiatives have failed.  What is new and different this time that will help them succeed."
Proposed.Summary: Overall positivity, "freedom with boundaries." Need to get customers past the fact that many Cloud (VCPP) initiatives have failed. What is new and different this time that will help them succeed?

Comments: Cloud (VCPP) architecture feels overwhelming, disjointed, and silo'd.  Simplify!
Proposed.Summary: Cloud (VCPP) architecture feels overwhelming, disjointed, and silo'd. Simplify!

Comments: Describe your Cloud (VCPP) framework as “fit for purpose"
Proposed.Summary: Describe your Cloud (VCPP) framework as “fit for purpose"

Comments: Equally important: Get clarity on the business outcome you all want to achieve
Proposed.Summary: Equally important: Get clarity on the business outcome you all want to achieve

Comments: Cloud Services is confusing.  It is a lot of silo'd services, not working together.
Proposed.Summary: Cloud Servicesis confusing. It is a lot of silo'd services, not working together.

Comments: Fantastic overview of vRealize Automation.  It's come a long way. Container Management (vRealize) is looking pretty good.
Proposed.Summary: Fantastic overview of vRealize Automation.  It's come a long way. Container Management (vRealize) is looking pretty good.

Comments: I see vmware taking a lead in Management (vRealize).  Microsoft is falling behind.
Proposed.Summary: I see vmware taking a lead in Management (vRealize).  Microsoft is falling behind.

Comments: Need clear use cases
Proposed.Summary: Need clear use cases

Comments: Referring to our key areas of investment, “It’s exciting.  Definitely the right areas of focus. Very interesting to see the cross-cloud functions coming through. Looking forward to more.”
Proposed.Summary: Referring to our key areas of investment, “It’s exciting. Definitely the right areas of focus. Very interesting to see the cross-cloud functions coming through. Looking forward to more.”

Comments: VMC on AWS story is coming together.  Execute well, price it correctly and VMware will win this market.
Proposed.Summary: VMC on AWS story is coming together. Execute well, price it correctly and VMware will win this market.

Comments: VMC on AWS story is coming together.  Value prop is clear.  Execute well, price it correctly and VMware will win this market.
Proposed.Summary: VMC on AWS story is coming together. Value prop is clear. Execute well, price it correctly and VMware will win this market.

Comments: VMC on AWS value prop is clear. Pricing seems to be in line with expectations.
Proposed.Summary: VMC on AWS value prop is clear. Pricing in line with expectations.

Comments: SP’s think VMC cross-cloud is a bunch of pieces that are not tied together in any way.
Proposed.Summary: SP’s think VMC cross-cloud is a bunch of pieces that are not tied together in any way.

Comments: VMware AirWatch is a good fit for organizations that require a comprehensive EMM feature set on a broad range of platforms including mobiles, tablets, PCs and advanced IoT devices.
Proposed.Summary: AirWatch is a good fit for orgs that require a comprehensive EMM feature set on a broad range of platforms.

Comments: Workspace One competitively positions VMware AirWatch as a broader solution to expand past EMM-only installations.
Proposed.Summary: Workspace ONE competitively positions AirWatch as a broader solution to expand past EMM-only installations.

Comments: AirWatch continues to push innovation with zero-day support of new OSs and with a unique solution for unmanaged devices.
Proposed.Summary: AirWatch continues to push innovation with zero-day support of new OSs and with a unique solution for unmanaged devices.

Comments: Gartner continues to hear of periodic code quality issues with the VMware AirWatch product, which are likely to be result of attempts to provide a broad set of capabilities quickly.
Proposed.Summary: Gartner continues to hear of periodic code quality issues with AirWatch, which are likely to be result of attempts to provide a broad set of capabilities quickly.

Comments: The combination of VMware AirWatch, EMC's data management, and Dell's service and hardware capabilities puts VMware in a strong position to handle the challenges of UEM from a single source.
Proposed.Summary: The combination of AirWatch, EMC's data management, and Dell's service and hardware capabilities puts VMware in a strong position to handle the challenges of UEM from a single source.

Comments: Customers still on the legacy AirWatch Inbox email application continue to report issues in application functionality and stability. However, those who have migrated to the new Boxer client are satisfied. Support for Secure Multipurpose Internet Mail Exchange (S/MIME) in Boxer is brand new and could not be verified regarding its quality at the time of this writing.
Proposed.Summary: Customers still on the legacy AirWatch Inbox email app continue to report issues...However, those who have migrated to the new Boxer client are satisfied. Support for (S/MIME) in Boxer is brand new and could not be verified regarding its quality at the time of this writing.

Comments: VMware AirWatch appears most frequently in Gartner clients' EMM vendor shortlists.
Proposed.Summary: VMware AirWatch appears most frequently in Gartner clients' EMM vendor shortlists.

Comments: AirWatch has proven large-scale deployments across most vertical markets.
Proposed.Summary: AirWatch has proven large-scale deployments across most vertical markets.

Comments: With regard to vRA 7.3, "This is all good.  A very good overview.  I like the container provisioning and I haven’t seen this before from VMware.  I can see how it will reduce time without stepping out of the environment."
Proposed.Summary: With regard to vRA 7.3, "This is all good. A very good overview. I like the container provisioning and I haven’t seen this before from VMware. I can see how it will reduce time without stepping out of the environment."

Comments: Seeing an uptick in Network Automation with Ansible, Puppet, Chef.  Network Insight competition is Gigamon, NetScout, Riverbed, Vectra, Viavi & Cisco.
Proposed.Summary: Seeing an uptick in Network Automation with Ansible, Puppet, Chef.  Network Insight competition is Gigamon, NetScout, Riverbed, Vectra, Viavi & Cisco.

Comments: CMP will need to go beyond Management (vRealize), again governance is critically important across all cloud layers.  It's going to be a multi-cloud world.  VMware will need to get familiar in the space.  Microservices will be more heavily used.  VMware doesn’t have a portfolio problem but has almost too much.  Recommends doing an analysis on top function areas.
Proposed.Summary: VMware doesn’t have a portfolio problem but has almost too much. Recommends doing an analysis on top function areas.

Comments: NSX – VMware needs to be clear when NSX-T or NSX-V are used as part of the solution. Need to be able to articulate roadmap, service details, and delivery dates for T.
Proposed.Summary: VMware needs to be clear when NSX-T or NSX-V are used as part of the solution. Need to be able to articulate roadmap, service details, and delivery dates for T.

Comments: ServiceNow is doubling down on cloud with the ITapp acquisition about a year ago.  Cloud Orchestration Suite is getting closer. If they are successful with the integration, they will be a stronger VMware competitor.
Proposed.Summary: ServiceNow is doubling down on cloud with the ITapp acquisition. Cloud Orchestration Suite is getting closer. Watch as a stronger VMware competitor.

Comments: NSX – VMware needs to be clear when NSX-T or NSX-V are used as part of the solution (re: VMC on AWS)
Proposed.Summary: VMware needs to be clear when NSX-T or NSX-V are used as part of the solution (re: VMC on AWS)

Comments: Only mildly familiar with Wavefront.  However, he mentioned the more he looked into the company and acquisition the more interesting it became. Sees modern applications need different things for monitoring and it helps them adapt.  vmware is more “black box” and Wavefront is the opposite so he sees as complimentary to each other.
Proposed.Summary: Only mildly familiar with Wavefront. However, he mentioned the more he looked into the company and acquisition the more interesting it became.

Comments: With regard to Wavefront, stated there is a lot of manual work needed to get the current product going and the platform is still pretty generic.  Biggest hot button is he felt we are (still) missing a strong AI story, which other competitors have.
Proposed.Summary: With Wavefront there a lot of manual work needed to get the current product going and the platform is still pretty generic. Need AI story.

Comments: I appreciate how careful you’re handling this and I think it speaks to that you recognize the potential backlash in PR from it. I agree with you that the impact is minimal (re: EOL of 3rd party vSwitches)
Proposed.Summary: I appreciate how carefully you’re handling this and I think it speaks to that you recognize the potential backlash in PR from it. I agree that the impact is minimal (re: EOL of 3rd party vSwitches)

Comments: Has heard of Wavefront but not following closely.  Finds the technology interesting.
Proposed.Summary: Has heard of Wavefront but not following closely. Finds the technology interesting.

Comments: Having a solution with private and public cloud for costing might not initially help sell more Management (vRealize) faster. But it becomes interesting when managing costs for the public cloud and when people have enough public and private cloud.  Also when there is a business unit focused on costs.
Proposed.Summary: Cloud costing might not initially help sell more Management (vRealize) faster. But it becomes interesting when managing costs for the public cloud and when people have enough public and private cloud. Also when there is a business unit focused on costs.

Comments: With regard to hybrid cloud, showcase what customers can do next with their apps.  Explain why would they put a vmware stack in Amazon.  Explain how to solve their problems and pain points now.  People buy to manage the things they have today.  On-prem has been good for VMW.
Proposed.Summary: Showcase what customers can do next with their apps. Explain how to solve their problems and pain points now. People buy to manage the things they have today.

Comments: vmware is not usually perceived as a cloud company, more as an infrastructure company.  Future of workload is move it and use it.  Let folks know that we do it. Help customers figure out their challenges.  Use case driven.
Proposed.Summary: vmware is not usually perceived as a cloud company, more as an infrastructure company. Future of workload is move it and use it. Help customers figure out their challenges.

Comments: Be clear that it is a tiny tiny piece of your install base that uses it, you’ve been in touch with them and they are in the process of moving away anyhow. This is about aligning resources to customer demand, you have a comprehenseive set of migration tools available, and you're giving folks plenty of time to make the move. To me, those are the key messages. (re: 3rd party vSwitches EOL)
Proposed.Summary: The key messages to make clear re: 3rd party vSwitches EOL: this is about aligning resources to customer demand, you have a comprehensive set of migration tools available, and you're giving folks plenty of time to make the move.

Comments: Very interesting and it does make sense.  Increasingly orgs are looking towards cross analysis done in the abstract.  Might be next level of benchmarking.  Slow but growing number of enterprises will appreciate the return of investment of their data.  More ways to funnel insight back
Proposed.Summary: Very interesting and it does make sense. Increasingly orgs are looking towards cross analysis done in the abstract. Potential growing number of enterprises will appreciate the return of investment of their data.

Comments: I think it makes sense, it’s absolutely the right thing to do. One could also argue that getting rid of a very used kernel API from a security standpoint is not a bad idea.
Proposed.Summary: I think it makes sense, it’s absolutely the right thing to do. One could also argue that getting rid of a very used kernel API from a security standpoint is not a bad idea.

Comments: Beware of RedHat and Microsoft.  Still a lot of HPE out there (but customers are frightened).  Watch the smaller guys (don’t let them confuse the customer).
Proposed.Summary: Beware of RedHat and microsoft. Still a lot of HPE out there (but customers are frightened). Watch the smaller guys (don’t let them confuse the customer).

Comments: Many clients have places where you can go in now, and then leverage later for AWS.  VMware is everywhere.  It’s a huge opportunity. The Announcement for Services is our Super bowl, don’t be ignored.  Need sticky services.
Proposed.Summary: Many clients have places where you can go in now, and then leverage later for AWS. VMware is everywhere.  It’s a huge opportunity.
